Allan autoriza quebra de seus sigilos

05 Nov 2019, 14:29

O blogueiro Allan dos Santos disse, na CPMI das Fake News, que nunca recebeu dinheiro do atual governo.
O presidente da comissão, senador Angelo Coronel, perguntou, então, se ele autorizaria a quebra de seus sigilos telefônico, fiscal e bancário.
Ele respondeu que sim.
Após sua advogada cochichar algo, porém, ponderou que “quem acusa tem o ônus da prova”.
O blogueiro ensaiou recuar da sua decisão, mas, diante do burburinho na comissão, acabou reafirmando que autorizaria a quebra dos sigilos.
text:
Allan authorizes breach of his secrets

05 Nov 2019, 14:29

Blogger Allan dos Santos told Fake News CPMI that he never received money from the current government.
The committee chairman, Senator Angelo Coronel, then asked if he would authorize the breaking of his telephone, tax and banking secrets.
He said yes.
After his lawyer whispered something, however, she pondered that "the accused has the burden of proof."
The blogger tried to back down his decision, but, faced with the commotion in the commission, eventually reaffirmed that he would authorize the breach of secrecy.
